Comments: ['lectures are not long... BUT THEY ARE BORING. they feel like they are 5 hours long instead of an hour and 15 minutes. gets off topic a lot too so its hard to write notes. just go to class and pay attention and youll pass. also, if you ask a question and she thinks its dumb she will freak out. ', "Lectures are long but the tests are based entirely off of the lecture if you go to class and take good notes you will be fine. She is extremely knowledgeabl, some people think she comes across rude, i have had 6 classes from her and after teaching for 40 years she knows he wants to be there to learn and who doesn't care and that' how she treats you", 'Dr Adams is one of the nicest and best professors I had at Uc.  I took both her world cultures 1 & 2.  Her class is all lecture.  Listen to her take good notes and you are honing to pass.  Her tests are based directly on her lecture.   Nothing is hidden or not covered.   SHE will NOT tolerate disrespect.  Go to class pay attention.', 'Very knowledgeable, mostly straightforward class. The entire course is lectures and tests taken from the notes from the lectures. Book is unnecessary because all tests are taken from notes. Not a "fun" class, but attendance is necessary to understand tests. Overall good teacher.', 'I really enjoyed having her as a professor, she gives fair tests of which if you payed attention the entire time in class you will do fine. she does go off topic a lot but be thankful of that for it is unnecessary and shortens what you actually have to learn.', 'As long as you come to class and pay attention to the lectures, you will do fine in her class.', "Straight lecture.  Boring.  If you miss a class, definitely get notes from someone else or you'll be extremely behind.", 'This professor is not very nice or helpful.  She does not care about her students and she is very rude.', "Outright nasty at times. I thought professors weren't supposed to lecture at UC. She talks for three hours!", 'As long as you take notes and listen to what she says, you will do fine on the exams. Plus you get extra points just for showing up for the exams.', 'Good Class', "Dr. Adams expects a lot, but she is also very fair. She finds various ways of giving extra points, like if you attend an event on campus. She does expect you to do your work, but I don't mind that - it is what I am paying for. Some professors here are all wind and you can tell that their degree was from some Mickey Mouse school.", 'No Comments', 'No Comments', 'No Comments', 'No Comments', 'terrible', "Everyone at UC basically has to take this woman because she is the only one that teaches World Cultures and its a basic requirement for all majors.  She knows a lot, she really does.  I'm not so sure she still has the passion for teaching, but she's really old school in her methods.  She's tough!", "She knows alot about what she teaches, but all you get to do in that class is take notes. If you don't want to take notes constantly, then don't take one of her classes.", 'Lots of Lecture....Only 4 grades during the whole semester...']
Tags: ["Skip class? You won't pass.", 'Get ready to read', 'EXTRA CREDIT', 'Tests? Not many', 'Lecture heavy']

Comments: ['This guy is a hottie!']

["He's very intelligent and was always there to help me. His classes are always tough but you will learn.", "I had him for two classes in the same semester. His lectures were incredible; I learned more in those classes than I have in any others. He's very thorough, stays up-to-date & provides excellent examples. The workload is heavy but never useless. I recommend Dr. Bayly to anyone who truly wants to learn, not just earn a credit. I miss having him.", 'Had him for multiple classes, since there are only a couple psych teachers at UC. His classeslectures are informative and engaging, but getting a decent grade is practically impossible. His tests could confuse an Ivy League MDPhd psychiatrist. The amount of work he expects you to put into the homework should make it eligible as a senior thesis. ', "Didn't like him at first, he has a nervous cough which really annoyed me, but it goes away. I used my textbook and the workbook ALOT so get them both.  You'll learn a lot and he'll help you out if you pay attention.", 'very rude', 'YEAH', "I had him for 6-7 classes a few years ago. I really enjoyed his classes. He does a great job of explaining everything and treated me great. He gets angry a lot though and no one never really knows why. Great guy.", 'No Comments', 'He is just a really cool teacher', 'Thinks he is above all of his students.  Cursed during the course which I found to be un professional. I recommend taking him for this class.', "he is a really cool professor.  I loved his class. it was hard but he really gets into it.  he's awesome.  I recomend his classes to everyone but be ready to work.  he's really hard too. but he's nice to look at.", 'Knows his stuff but is a big nerd and expects students to eat, breathe and sleep the stuff like he does.', 'This was a very fun and interesting class. He is very knowledgable of his subject matter and only accepts his students best efforts.', 'This is an interesting course, but you have to study and attend class.Beware, he has a short fuse and goes off easily. Comments: ['Thank you for your patience and dedication to the course and the students. Very much appreciated.', 'Thank you for your patience and dedication to the course and the students. Very much appreciated.', 'Approachable, clear and concise, genuine care for his students, prepare.', 'I want to thank my professor for always being understanding, resourceful, and knowledgeable in this course.', 'Thank you for all the work you put into the class. It was a very good experience for my first college course.', 'Personally, I felt like he cared about my success. I think he truly wants his students to grow from the materials we covered.', 'Main part of class is key assignment prep. New APA format is frustrating but doable! Very supportive instructor. READ/STUDY class notes!', 'I learned a lot from this introduction course. I will take everything I have learned and apply in my learning experience here at UCWV and in my professional career. Mr. Giaimo is a wealth of experience and knowledge. I will continue to take courses he teaches at UCWV because he brings with him real world experience that I can apply to my career fie', 'Professor Giaimo was very passionate about this subject. He taught it in a manner that was easy to understand that in Ethics there will be difference of opinions, and the end of the day there is no"right or "wrong " way of expressing your views points.', 'Thank you for mentoring us through the course and look forward to taking more courses in the future with you. You made it easy to understand and walked through it with us. I havent been in higher formal education in 30 years and was nervous but in the end was confident I learned a lot.', 'Thank you and thank you for your service and all that you do.', 'I wanted to thank you for everything. I have not had professors that have been so intuitive in their covering of material as those that I have had since starting classes . I look forward to the possibility of having you in future courses. Know that you have made a difference in my life and understanding of leadership and all it encompasses.', 'Upon returning to school after a long break, I was pleasantly surprised. I highly recommend this class and teacher. Tip: Read APA prior to taking this class.', "The biggest difference I found between this class and others is my connection with Mr. Giaimo's leadership style. Treating everyone like an adult and understanding that life can be hectic has led to students' feeling more more comfortable in class and with no fear of repercussions.", 'I enjoyed this course mostly because of the professor that taught it. The professor was very understanding to the fact that all the students are adult learners and not college-aged kids that are living on campus. I was so frustrated, I was going to seriously quit! Honestly, Prof. Tony inspired me to hang in there! I am glad that I did. Comments: ["I had Professor Long while she taught at WV State University and love her. She was the most helpful teacher I have ever had. She gave me confidence to write, and believe in myself. ['This man is a genius, to say the least!  I have complete respect for him!', 'Good teacher. Come to class and read the assignments and you\'ll have no problem getting at least a "b". He isn\'t boring but mannerisms will get repetitive. He says he doesn\'t like to lecture but often will. He incorporates a lot of class participation which really helps keep your interest. The reading isn\'t heavy for this particular class. ', 'A very intelligent and genuinely nice professor. Taught the class very well and explained things very thoroughly. Attendance is crucial as he goes over important information every day, but as long as you pay attention you will pass the class and enjoy it like I did!', "Dr Martin is awesome. Take his asses.  He is a very energetic teacher. Lives his work.  He is very easy going but requires you to work. He uses a lot of books in his classes. Tests are difficult if you don't read the material. He's really approachable and is a great listener. He seems to really care about his students well-being and will help you whenever you have a problem. You have to work, and work hard, but it's worth it.", 'One of my favorite teachers/professors by far. Comments: ['Dr. Sun is one of the kindest professors Ive had. He is also very funny! While I didnt do amazing in his class, it was still enjoyable because of his personality. Biochem is tough but doable! If you have an opportunity to have class with him, i would recommend it. Just make sure you stay on top of your studying :)', 'Dr. Sun is one of the kindest professors Ive had. He is also very funny! While I didnt do amazing in his class, it was still enjoyable because of his personality. Biochem is tough but doable! If you have an opportunity to have class with him, i would recommend it. Just make sure you stay on top of your studying :)', 'Dr. Sun is one of the best professors at UC. He cares for his students so much. Sometimes you cant understand him cause his accent, but hes always willing to help. You definitely have to earn your grade, so if youre looking for an easy A dont. He will prepare you for all the standardized tests, which is the ultimate goal right? Overall great', "He's a very good teacher, and will prepare you standardized tests (MCAT, PCAT). You can ask him questions during class (not always recommended because he will think you're stupid), or in his office. His test are very difficult and extensive. If you want to pass, you have to study your butt off and go to class. Only 1 extra credit opp. for 1%.", "He is a very good teacher, he makes the class fun-well, as fun as you can make organic. He is willing to help, but does not give you his office hours:/ He goes over the homework before you turn it in. The tests are all based on the notes- reading the book will help, but isn't mandatory. I really enjoy his class.", "He's very helpful and ultra nice, but sometimes it's hard to understand what he's trying to say/teach. I personally will avoid his classes.", "I've had Dr. Sun for Organic I & II, Inorganic, Biochemistry, and currently Advanced Organic Chemistry. He is most certainly the BEST professor I've ever had. He is extremely knowledgeable about almost anything chemistry related and can teach it well. He does a good bit of research with students so he can teach even better than he already does.", 'He loves to teach.', 'DOES NOT GIVE GRADES-THEY MUST BE EARNED.COURSE IS DIFFICULT FOR MANY,BUT IT IS DIFFICULT VIRTUALLY EVERYWHERE. SUN IS A GOOD TEACHER AND COVERS MATERIAL EXTENSIVELY BUT THIS COURSE IS NOT BASKETWEAVING 101', 'Dr Sun is a good teacher. Good quatlities: He is very nice and patient. He will go over work with you and help you with any problems you have.
